txt_en: In unity, there is strength.
txt_cn: 团结就是力量。

txt_en: Light tomorrow with today!
txt_cn: 用今日行动点亮明日未来！

txt_en: Dreams without goals are just dreams.
txt_cn: 没有目标的梦想，只是一场梦。

txt_en: Love can be weakness, but it can also be a weapon.
txt_cn: 爱是软肋，亦是盔甲。

txt_en: In a partnership, there is give and there is take.
txt_cn: 友情是双向奔赴。

txt_en: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
txt_cn: 一次失败并不代表最终失败。

txt_en: You'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in.
txt_cn: 秋色渐近。

txt_en: Nothing feels impossible when I'm with you.
txt_cn: 与你携手，万事顺遂。

txt_en: Don't be afraid to think outside the box.
txt_cn: 不要害怕跳出固有思维。

txt_en: If you keep living in the past, you can't fully live in the present.
txt_cn: 总是活在过去，就无法享受当下。

txt_en: Live life on your own terms.
txt_cn: 活出自我。

txt_en: Never be afraid of who you are.
txt_cn: 不要害怕面对真实的自己。

txt_en: Remember, it's the courage to continue that counts.
txt_cn: 要记得，怀揣坚持的勇气至关重要。

txt_en: We may be down, but we're not out.
txt_cn: 我们可能会失败，但永远不会被打败。

txt_en: Sometimes the hardest things in life are the things most worth doing.
txt_cn: 有时，事情愈难而意义愈大。

txt_en: Even a game lost is a game well played.
txt_cn: 即使败局一场，也可以是漂亮一仗。

txt_en: Great success is built on failure.
txt_cn: 失败是成功的奠基石。

txt_en: You are more than what you have become.
txt_cn: 你的能力，不止于此。

txt_en: Find your inner beast.
txt_cn: 发掘你内心的强大。

txt_en: Smart is making the right decision at the right time.
txt_cn: 聪明就是在正确的时间做正确的决定。

txt_en: You keep hoping and you keep fighting, and one day you win.
txt_cn: 保持希望并不断努力，终有一天会取得胜利。

txt_en: We fight for our future!
txt_cn: 我们为未来而奋斗！

txt_en: Winners don't need motivation. Winners need discipline.
txt_cn: 胜者要的不是打鸡血，而是自律。

txt_en: There's a difference between knowing the path, and walking the path.
txt_cn: 知道和做到是两码事。

txt_en: Never make decisions out of fear.
txt_cn: 不要让恐惧左右你的决定。

txt_en: The heart wants what it wants.
txt_cn: 听从你内心的想法。

txt_en: You cannot judge a place before you've even seen it.
txt_cn: 未知全貌，不予置评。

txt_en: Anything is possible when you have inner peace.
txt_cn: 冷静面对，事事皆有可能。
